DOC.HEADLINE: SOME 1994 DATES TO WATCH
DOC.TEXT: JANUARY 10-11 -- NATO summit in Brussels . FEBRUARY 11-13 -- First Washington visit by Japanese Prime_Minister Morihiro Hosokawa . 12-26 -- Winter_Olympics , Lillehammer , Norway . MARCH 11 -- Inauguration of Eduardo Frei as president of Chile . 31 -- Deadline for withdrawal of U.S. troops from Somalia . APRIL 13 -- Deadline for full Israeli withdrawal from Gaza and Jericho 27 -- South_African elections are to formally end white rule . MAY 6 -- Official opening of Channel_Tunnel between Britian and France . 7 -- 40th anniversary of the fall of Dien Bien Phu . JUNE 6 -- 50th anniversary of D-Day Normandy landings . 9 - 12 -- European Parliament elections . JULY 13 -- Palestian elections . 17 -- World Cup_final in Pasadena . AUGUST 9 -- 20th anniversary of the resignation of Richard Nixon . 24 -- Mexican general_election . 30 -- Deadline for withdrawal of last Russian forces from eastern Germany . SEPTEMBER No exact date -- Official departure of last U.S. , British and French forces from Berlin , leaving the German_capital with no foreign military presence for the first time since 1945 . OCTOBER 3 -- First round of Brazilian general_elections . NOVEMBER 9 -- Fifth anniversary of the collapse of the Berlin Wall . DECEMBER 3 -- 10th anniversary of Bhopal , India , gas-leak disaster .
